sourcesContent:
import { Checkmark } from "react-checkmark"; import Layout from "../layout"; function Success() { const cart = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("cart")) || []; const checkout = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("checkout")) || []; return (

Order placed successfully!

Your Information

{checkout.delivery.first_name} {checkout.delivery.last_name}

{checkout.delivery.email}

{checkout.delivery.phone.replace( /(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})/, "$1-$2-$3", )}

Payment Information

{checkout.payment.mode === "Cash" ? (

Cash on Delivery

) : (

Card Payment

XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-{checkout.payment.card_number.slice(-2)}

{checkout.payment.expiry_month + "/" + checkout.payment.expiry_year}

)}

Delivery Information

{checkout.delivery.address}

Shipping Information

{checkout.shipping}

 ); } export default Success;
